suggest.amasty/mega-menu-page-builder: Install mega-menu-page-builder module to activate PageBuilder and Mega Menu integration.
suggest.amasty/mega-menu-graphql: Install mega-menu-graphql module to activate GraphQl and Mega Menu integration.
suggest.amasty/module-mega-menu-mftf-2: Install mega-menu-mftf-2 module to be able to run Mega Menu MFTF tests for Magento 2.3.5+ version
suggest.amasty/module-mega-menu-mftf-3: Install mega-menu-mftf-3 module to be able to run Mega Menu MFTF tests for Magento 2.4.0+ version
